title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Beat eggs with pecorino cheese and pepper.
Drain pasta and mix quickly with egg mixture and pancetta off the heat.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or fry the chicken pieces until cooked through.
Sauté onions, add tomatoes and cook down to a sauce.
Add grilled chicken to sauce, stir in cream and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender beef strips in a creamy mushroom sauce served over noodles.
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Stir in sour cream and mustard.
